[vc_section css=”.vc_custom_1626803225822{padding-top: 100px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;}”][vc_row content_placement=”top”][vc_column width=”1/4″]

Dr.S.Silas Sargunam

Deputy Director i/c

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”About the Affiliation and its activities” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:24px|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1626803563478{margin-top: 25px !important;margin-bottom: 15px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1626803424613{margin-bottom: 10px !important;}”]The Centre for Affiliation of Institutions (CAI) is an autonomous Centre of Anna University, its primary function being to facilitate granting of affiliation and to process other allied matters pertaining to the Engineering colleges in Tamil Nadu encompassing Chennai (Head Quarters) and region Tirunelveli.[/vc_column_text][vc_zigzag el_border_width=”10″ css=”.vc_custom_1626803455092{margin-top: 15px !important;margin-bottom: 15px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Administration” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:24px|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1626803408005{margin-bottom: 15px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1626803443052{margin-bottom: 10px !important;}”]The administrative activities of the Centre are monitored and regulated by an Executive Committee whose members are nominated by the University. The Vice-Chancellor, Anna University Chennai is the Chairman of the Executive Committee. The Centre is headed by a Director assisted by Deputy Directors, administrative and other supporting staff.[/vc_column_text][vc_zigzag el_border_width=”10″ css=”.vc_custom_1626803455092{margin-top: 15px !important;margin-bottom: 15px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Objectives” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:24px|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1626803471692{margin-bottom: 15px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1626803485196{margin-bottom: 10px !important;}”]Enabling the Engineering colleges under its jurisdiction to achieve academic excellence by guiding them to equip themselves with qualified faculty and state of the art infrastructure so as to produce competent engineers to meet the local and global requirements.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″]
Mrs.D.Judit Kinsee Sheera

Junior Technical Assistant

View More
[/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section]
